title: Visa Updates: Faster Student Visa Processing Announced
excerpt: Authorities announce streamlined processes to reduce student visa wait times for key destinations.
contentHTML: Authorities have introduced a faster processing track for international student visas, cutting average wait times significantly for the upcoming intake.

title: Scholarships: New Funding for STEM International Students
excerpt: Multiple universities launch new scholarships for STEM programs targeting international applicants.
contentHTML: Universities across North America and Europe have announced new scholarship rounds for STEM fields, with deadlines approaching soon.

title: Student Life: Affordable Housing Tips Near Campus
excerpt: Practical strategies to find safe and affordable accommodation near your university.
contentHTML:
• Start early and compare listings
  • Check commute times
  • Join verified student housing groups

title: Finance: Managing Tuition and Living Costs
excerpt: How to plan your finances for study abroad: budgets, banking, and part‑time work.
contentHTML: Build a realistic budget, open a student‑friendly bank account, and understand allowed work hours in your visa.

title: Opportunities: Internships Open for Spring/Summer
excerpt: Top companies announce internship windows suitable for international students.
contentHTML: Application deadlines vary by company; prepare your CV and references in advance.

title: Wellbeing: Health Insurance Essentials for Students
excerpt: Understand coverage basics and how to pick the right plan abroad.
contentHTML: Compare public vs. private options and know how to claim reimbursements efficiently.
